body_html:
the documentation of MSELoss is clear about this behavior:

x and y arbitrary shapes with a total of n elements each.

If the right "fix" is to remove this behavior, the documentation has to be updated.

the documentation of MSELoss is clear about this behavior:
x and y arbitrary shapes with a total of n elements each.

body:
the documentation of MSELoss is clear about this behavior:

```
x and y arbitrary shapes with a total of n elements each.
```

If the right "fix" is to remove this behavior, the documentation has to be updated.
